recommendations.title: Memento
recommendations.description: A psychological thriller that explores the story of a man suffering from short-term memory loss, attempting to track down his wife's murderer.
recommendations.why: Recommended due to your appreciation for mind-bending plots like 'Fight Club' and 'Inception'.

recommendations.title: Fight Club
recommendations.description: A disillusioned office worker forms an underground fight club with soap salesman Tyler Durden, leading to drastic changes in his life.
recommendations.why: Shares thematic similarities with 'Se7en' and 'The Dark Knight', which you've rated highly.

recommendations.title: Her
recommendations.description: In a near-future world, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.
recommendations.why: Fits well with your liking for emotional narratives like 'Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind' and 'Arrival'.
